Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1980...
Earned first career win on 5/1/1987...
Injured on 4/15/1991 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/10/1995 to a 2-year deal worth $8,500,000 per year...
Traded from Pittsburgh to California on 1/31/1996 (Going to PIT: 1B G. Colbrunn, RF T. Womack. Going to CAL: P B. Taylor)...
